response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by our previous customers. Given its quality and features, it's worth $120 to us, but considering your needs and expectations, we're more than happy to extend a special offer. For you, we propose to sell it for $110. This is a great opportunity to get a high-quality product at a reasonable price. What do you think about this offer?", "product_price": 110}
